title: Baby Got Bite
description: Vincent is not a fan of Halloween.All the bad costumes and hassle are just too much for this dude. The only reason he even buys his costume is to get closer to a cute, emo barista with a lip ring.Who could possibly ignore a lip ring?The only problem is that he's been out of the game since the 90s, so he's a little rusty.Oh, and he's a vampire.Who doesn't understand Snap Chat.Baby Got Bite is a 4K m/m romance with sexy times, humor and way too many 90s references.
author: Maz Maddox
